definition: the four limbs of the body

pinyin: tou2 nao3 jian3 dan1 si4 zhi1 fa1 da2

sentences.english: The body is brawny, limbs forceful, head round eyes, short neck little kiss long.
sentences.chinese: 軀體粗壯，四肢強健有力，頭圓頸短，眼小吻長。

sentences.english: The torsos are hollow, with solid arms and legs.
sentences.chinese: 這些武士的軀幹是空心的，而四肢是實心的。

sentences.english: Most animals walking on four legs have long muzzles.
sentences.chinese: 大多數用四肢走路的動物口鼻部分都相當長。

sentences.english: He is now quadriplegic and confined to a wheelchair.
sentences.chinese: 現在的他四肢麻痹，只能呆在輪椅上。

sentences.english: He presented with complaints of quadriparesis that had progressed over the course of 2 years.
sentences.chinese: 患者出現四肢輕癱，在兩年病程中逐步加劇。

sentences.english: He was small in height and slender in limb.
She's stretched out in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 她伸開四肢躺在太陽下。

sentences.english: Moulds can be made of your limbs and new bits and bobs grown in a Petri dish while you wait.
sentences.chinese: 你的四肢和各種臟器的模具可在皮氏培養皿裏生成。

sentences.english: When I am pinned and wriggling on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 如果我被釘住了，四肢蠕動於牆面。

sentences.english: Red Jacket lay sprawled on the cobbles one hundred feet below.
sentences.chinese: 紅夾克四肢伸展，撲躺在三十多米底下的卵石街上。

sentences.english: Katinka froze, her limbs stiffened, and she fell motionless.
sentences.chinese: 卡廷卡凍僵了，她的四肢都麻木了，渾身失去了直覺。

sentences.english: Medical characterized by catatonia especially either rigidity or extreme laxness of limbs.
sentences.chinese: 具有緊張症特徵的，尤指四肢的極端僵硬或鬆弛。
她被四肢張開地捆在牀上。

sentences.english: This was true of the chick leg, which has four toes, and the chick wing.
sentences.chinese: 這正是雞的四肢發展的狀況，其中雞的腳有四個趾。

sentences.english: Keto's body slowly becomes bloated. Her limbs however stay emaciated.
sentences.chinese: 刻託的身體慢慢變得臃腫，可四肢依舊枯瘦。

sentences.english: Keep your extremities as warm as possible.

definition: lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
hand and foot/movement of limbs/action/trick/step in a procedure (CL: 道[dao4])
